title: Emotional Short Music Clips
description: 70 emotional short music clips for any situation in your game
longDescription:
Preview of all tracks on Youtube: https://youtu.be/CBjsWg-6KR4


This is a collection of 70 emotional short music clips.


You can use them in your game to emphasize the introduction of a new character, a new situation or just as a background music for a dialogue.


All tracks have a duration from about 5 to 34 seconds with a combined length of 21:16 minutes.
